sentence.Network_en: He had tried to outflank them.
sentence.Network_cn: 他曾试图占据上风，胜过他们。

sentence.Network_en: Why had it not been possible to outflank them in some way?
sentence.Network_cn: 为什么没有办法从侧翼包抄他们 呢 ?

sentence.Network_en: It must have been possible to outflank them in some way.
sentence.Network_cn: 从侧翼包抄他们应该是有可能的.

list.abs: He insured his troops against defeat by outflanking tactics ., 他为确保部队不被打败而采用迂回战术.
We used outflanking tactics and the enemies were confused and disoriented., 我们采用迂回战术 , 把敌人弄得晕头转向.
the choice of best outflanking force and outflanking opportunity in campaign ., 作战中迂回兵力及迂回时机的最佳选择.
the choice of best outflanking force and outflanking opportunity in campaign ., 作战中迂回兵力及迂回时机的最佳选择.

entry.def: In a battle, when one group of soldiers outflanks another, it succeeds in moving past the other group in order to be able to attack it from the side.

example.ex: ...plans designed by General Schwarzkopf to outflank them from the west.
example.tran: 施瓦茨科普夫将军制订的从西翼包抄他们的作战计划

entry.def: If you outflank someone, you succeed in getting into a position where you can defeat them, for example in an argument.

example.ex: He had tried to outflank them...
example.tran: 他曾试图占据上风，胜过他们。

example.ex: His own ideas were outflanked by those of more radical reformers.
example.tran: 他辩不过那些更加激进的改革派。

means.word_mean: 1. go around the flank of (an opposing army)

sentences.sentence: "the goal was to best the competition"

auth_sentence.content: Unalloyed quality...can still outflank nifty packaging.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Unalloyed quality...can still outflank nifty packaging.

auth_sentence.content: To outflank the party, some opposition groups may...move further to the right.
auth_sentence.res_content: To outflank the party, some opposition groups may...move further to the right.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: To outflank the party, some opposition groups may...move further to the right.

auth_sentence.content: That helps them decide when it's time to switch from one strategy to another -- and thus outflank competitors.
